summary: The agent report is excellent in identifying root causes and reasoning but lacks some details in causal chain completeness and actionability.

dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified the root causes related to MMDVFS OPP3 and CM/PowerHal/DDR voting issues.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The causal chain is mostly captured but lacks explicit mention of the SW_REQ2/SW_REQ3 voting mechanisms.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: Most metrics are correctly identified, but some specific CPU frequencies are missing.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The diagnostic reasoning is logical and flows well, correctly identifying MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: No historical fixes or practical recommendations are provided.
